rogiyekuge aushadha waidyawaraya wisin denu labanne mahath wagakimeniga nisi pramithiyakata nishpadanaya wu aushadha kalthaba gatha yuthu kalasimawan ikmawa nogiyala wiwidha krumi ha wenath wisha sathungen aaraksha karagath kisiyam kramawedayakata sakasu aushadha warga misa anarakshitha apirisidu drawyayan musu aushadha bhawithayata sudusu nowega beheth badu athara amuwen gatha yuthu drawya ha dina gananak wiyali swabhawayata path wu aushadha pawa gatha yuththe itha pirisuduwayaga eewa krumiyangen aaraksha karagatha yuthuyiga samahara aushadha warga dina ganan gatha wu pasu pal wi duganda hamimakata lakwiya hakiyiga in wishabija ekathu wi anisi prathipala labadi rogaya suwa wima pama karayiga roga suwayata mewani parana aushadha sudusu nowana bawa waidyawaru sandahan karanne in hariyakarawa rogayata nisi prathipala labagatha nohaki nisayiga ee nisa nisi pramithiyen sadumlath aushadha laba ganima paribhogika obage wagakimayiga

pasuwa mohu siya niwase sitiya di ikuth 05 da kadu ha polu ragath pirisak sakakaruta barapathala lesa thuwala sidukara palagos thibe.thuwala labu pathala prabalaya yapanaya rohalata athulu kirimen pasu wadidura prathikara sandaha dakunu kolambaa rohala wetha marukara yawa thibe.udayan prawruththi karthruta ella wu praharayata mohu sambandha bawata heliwimen pasu rohale di athadanguwata gath athara, ehidi sakakaru siya kamaththen praharaya pilibanda heli kara thibini.sakakaruta barapathala lesa pahara di ghathanaya kirimata kisiyam pirisak uthsaha kala bawa da ema praharayata siddhiyata adala nithignya mahatha mul wi athi bawata wishwasa karana bawa da sakakaru polisiyata helikara thibe.
